Container.Name: 4get
Container.Overview:
4get is a lightweight, open-source proxy search engine designed to provide a private, ad-free search experience. It allows users to query popular search engines like Google, DuckDuckGo, and others without tracking or displaying sponsored ads. Beyond web searches, 4get supports media-specific queries for videos, images, music, and more, making it a versatile tool for privacy-conscious users. For enhanced privacy, it can be combined with Tailscale (Unraid 7 and above) for secure remote access and routed through a VPN exit point for IP anonymisation.
Features • Proxy-based search for privacy and simplicity. • Support for multiple search engines and media-specific queries (web, video, images, music, etc.). • No ads or sponsored results.
Setup Recommendations • Combine with Tailscale for secure, remote access. • Use with a VPN exit point (e.g., Gluetun VPN) to anonymise outgoing queries.

Config.Name: Bot protection
Config.Description: bot protection only need if on open interent
